SummaryEnglish: Two young wrestlers face each other in a recently revived underground wrestling organization, the Tiger's Lair, which destroyed the wrestling dojo they grew up in. One took over the training facilities of Naoto Date at the foot of Mount Fuji, as well as the mask he left behind. The other dared to enter the Tiger's Lair and won a fierce competition, receiving a jet-black tiger mask. One tiger walks the path of light, while the other walks the path of shadows. Neither one knows the other's face. On the ring, they are natural enemies, but they have the same purposeâ€”destroy the Tiger's Lair!

1.SummaryEnglish: Daisuke Fujii is brutally beaten by GWM wrestler Yellow Devil Mask.  This causes two wrestlers, unbeknownst to each other, to take up a mask -- Tiger Mask and Tiger the Dark -- to hunt him down.  One fights GWM from the outside, one from within.

2.SummaryEnglish: Tiger Mask and Tiger the Dark appear in a tag team match against each other.  Who is the stronger tiger?

3.SummaryEnglish: Naoto trains fiercely to improve as Tiger Mask.  Takuma recalls his run in with Yellow Devil Mask.

4.SummaryEnglish: Tiger Mask enters a challenging battle against Red Death Mask.  As the Tiger's mask soaks with blood, can he get out alive?

5.SummaryEnglish: Tiger Mask takes on the extremely unconventional Fukuyama Mask.

6.SummaryEnglish: Two Idols take the stage to entertain at the arena.  Later, Tiger Mask takes on Gorilla Jeet Singh in the semi-finals.

7.SummaryEnglish: Tiger Mask gets interviewed.  During it, he learns of the previous Tiger Mask.

8.SummaryEnglish: Tiger Mask joins Tanahashi as a team for 2 vs 2 matches.  However, when a Masked Tournament comes up that would interfere, Tiger sadly has to drop out as fighting Yellow Devil may be possible.

9.SummaryEnglish: Tiger Mask and Tiger the Dark get into a fight during the opening ceremony.  After being broken up, Tiger the Dark fights Fukuwara Mask in the first bout.

10.SummaryEnglish: Mister Question takes out Tiger Mask's opponent, Wagner, before the match even begins.  Tiger Mask decides to battle Mister Question in his place, who knows of the previous Tiger Mask.

11.SummaryEnglish: Tiger Mask's friends help him go under training to develop a special finishing move.

12.SummaryEnglish: It's-The-Ace advances. Tiger Mask takes on Tiger the Dark. Can Tiger Mask use his new finishing technique before it's completed?

13.SummaryEnglish: Tiger Mask gets his battle with Yellow Devil.  As the match proceeds, Tiger is bound to show the world something.

14.SummaryEnglish: After discovering that Yellow Devil was Billy the Kidman and not the masked wrestler he was after, Tiger Mask is at a loss.  As Naoto recovers, he goes on a date with Rurika.

15.SummaryEnglish: A female wrestler tag-team match opens up for Tiger Mask's next bout.  Tiger has to face a human as big as Bigfoot.

16.SummaryEnglish: Haruka continues to promote Tiger Mask.  She gets a match set up between him and a Mexican wrestler.

17.SummaryEnglish: Tiger Mask and Haruka get dragged on for a day of sweet tasting before matches later that day.

18.SummaryEnglish: The Candy Pair duo needs a replacement, so Haruka becomes the Spring Tiger.  How will her wrestling debut go?

19.SummaryEnglish: Fallen GWM wrestlers are pitted against each other in a Battle Royale to see who is allowed to surface to the world stage once more.

20.SummaryEnglish: Takuma and Kevin team up and finally reach the peak.  An unusual wrestler awaits them at the top.

21.SummaryEnglish: Tiger the Dark makes his return to Japan.  A newly masked Tiger fighter does as well, The Third.  Tiger Mask fights against a wrestler who abandoned his local market for GWM.  As Tiger begins to question him, he and Tiger the Dark get in each others face in a tense situation.

22.SummaryEnglish: Fukuwara attempts to hold a town revival event and advertises a public wrestling match without consulting any wrestlers.  Will they join and help him?

23.SummaryEnglish: GWM hosts a new kind of tournament -- War Games.  All fighters are pitted against each other in a Battle Royale.  The two fighters to make it through five battles, to the top, will face off against each other.  GWM's Heavyweight Champion, The Third, is also taking place.

24.SummaryEnglish: Tiger Mask and Tiger the Dark find each other as the tournament progresses.  Tiger the Dark has a new trick up his sleeve.

25.SummaryEnglish: After defeating Tiger Mask, Tiger the Dark proceeds to the final match against The Third.  Both Dark and Tiger learn who might be under The Third's mask.  Which Tiger's identity gets revealed?

26.SummaryEnglish: In the midst of a match, it is interrupted by two masked wrestlers -- Mysterious Miracle I and II.  Who are they and what do they want?

27.TitleEnglish: A Deadly Match against King Tiger
27.SummaryEnglish: Tiger Mask squares off against King Tiger, who specializes in martial arts and striking.  Can Tiger get past him?  The Miracles are up to something -- how will they multiply?

28.SummaryEnglish: Naoto meets Takuma for the first time following their fight with the Yellow Devil three years prior.  Tiger Mask continues to fight with the Miracles, earning him the traitorous name, the Yellow Demon.

29.SummaryEnglish: As Tiger Mask betrays his former comrades in order to gain a fight against The Third, the latest 5 vs 5 match takes a drastic turn. Monopoly declares war on the NJPW wrestlers by sending in The Third. What will Tiger do?

30.SummaryEnglish: The matches begin with NPJW wrestlers versus the Miracles. Tiger Mask faces off in a special match against Miracle IV, who is revealed to be Universal Mask!  What is the relationship between The Third and Fukuwara Mask?!

31.TitleEnglish: Showdown with The Arashi Juken Style
31.SummaryEnglish: Tiger travels to Kyoto in search of a killer move.  While there he meets competing heads of a dojo, which is real and who will he side with?!

32.SummaryEnglish: A 3v3 match between Monoply and NJPW ends in a draw as fighters from both sides commit fouls.  Tiger Mask faces off against Miracle 3 in a Lumberjack match, which allows the seconds to assist outside of the ring...but Tiger has no seconds.

33.SummaryEnglish: Monopoly calls in Tiger the Black and Big Tiger the Second.  Nagata and Tiger Mask face-off in a 2v2 match, with an unlikely result.  Meanwhile, Takuma reaches out to Nagato to help him re-train at his Mt. Fuji facility.

34.SummaryEnglish: Takuma continues to train at Mt, Fuji, however, the training location is beginning to draw unwanted attention. The final five match battle of the Wars kicks off. One of the wrestlers is missing!

35.SummaryEnglish: The second battle kicks off after Tiger the Black and Makabe draw. This causes both sides to hangs straetgies and wrestler order. Following the second match, even more order complications happen. Naito cannot make it, but a wrestler comes to he locker room asking to join!

36.SummaryEnglish: Tiger the Dark officially joins the NJPW lineup, making his comeback. After the 3v3 match goes to Monopoly, NJPW are down two matches. With Tanahashi out, NJPW sends out Tiger Mask and Tiger the Dark. Monopoly sends Big Tiger the Second and... The Third!

37.SummaryEnglish: The final battle of the War between Monopoly and NJPW is up, but NJPW's wrestlers are injured.  As Tiger Mask is selected, his match against the Third is finally happening.

38.SummaryEnglish: Following Naoto's victory, he and Takuma look for additional stages to concur.  Meanwhile, Haruna and Miss X begin their own wrestling adventure! A Girl's League.
